name: SquareGain Technologies Private Limited
overview:
SquareGain showcases the best deals in your neighborhood on the things you love to do and places you like to visit the most.

It is a social deals website that has a huge social component attached to your deals which creates an awesome social engagement deal platform. Users can share their deals, add and invite friends, earn badges & loyalty points and do a lot of other things.

SquareGain encourages users to revisit the merchants that they bought deals from by rewarding them with loyalty points. Merchants will also have information on how many users bought their deal and how many users resisted later.

Vision To provide an exceptional online shopping experience.

Mission Find the best deals for our users. Find the best customers for our clients. Deliver outstanding customer service.
